title: MySQLDEGREES()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLDEGREES()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Convert the radian value into degrees:
SELECT DEGREES(1.5);

Definition and Usage
The DEGREES() function converts a value in radians to degrees.
Note:
See also the
RADIANS()
and
PI()
functions.
Syntax
DEGREES(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. A numeric value
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Convert the radian value into degrees:
SELECT DEGREES(PI()*2);

★
+1
